title: Zen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Pan-Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Night club and music venue, opened in 2012. Offers a small food menu that changes frequently. Two chefs are from California and know what vegan means. The Budda's shrooms (mushroom, zucchini, eggplant in a red curry topped with basil and toasted cashew) and the enlightenment tabla (cucumber rolls, grilled veggies, Thai style quiona), and the Saigon baguette can all be made vegan.
